org.dejave.attica.engine.operators
Class Sink

java.lang.Object
  org.dejave.attica.engine.operators.Operator
      org.dejave.attica.engine.operators.UnaryOperator
          org.dejave.attica.engine.operators.Sink
Direct Known Subclasses:
MessageSink
public class Sink
extends UnaryOperator

Sink: An operator acting as a sink for other operators (i.e., it simply saves its input and propagates it on getNext() calls).

Author:
sviglas
